attributes.action: Petition to make physical education (P.E) everyday uniform.
attributes.additional_details: Petition to make physical education everyday uniform as pupils feel more comfortable and relaxed in an working environment. Wearing this allows pupils to remain relaxed and calm which assists there education. The majority of pupils prefer to wear there physical education kit everyday than there own as they don't have to worry about being made fun of for wearing a certain thing. They also like wearing this as it enables them to do more in a lesson as they don't have to change before and after.
attributes.background: Petition to make physical education everyday uniform as pupils feel more comfortable and relaxed in an working environment. Wearing this allows pupils to remain relaxed and calm which assists there education.

rejection.details: It is for the governing body of a school, not the Government or House of Commons, to decide whether there should be a school uniform policy and if so what that should be, and whether there should be a separate uniform for different activities, such as PE.
